__NOTOC__

This is a partitioned version of our [[Links_for_Digital_Musicology|
Links for Digital Musicology]]. This view is not well suited to websites with heterogeneous material (a composer's letters, diary, photographs, etc.), which can be listed in multiple ways, but early users found it better for general navigation.   

This wiki provides links to substantial open-access projects of use to musicians and musicologists. For curated digital and hybrid editions, see [http://wiki.ccarh.org/wiki/EVE_%28Electronic_and_Virtual_Editions%29 EVE: Electronic and Virtual Editions]. For older projects that are not readily accessible online see [[ADAM|ADAM: Archive of Digital Applications in Musicology]].
